(Deep, menacing voice) Ah, the importance of loyalty and obedience. These are the pillars that hold my empire together, the foundation upon which my power is built. My followers must understand that their unwavering dedication is the lifeblood that sustains me, that drives me to conquer and dominate all who dare stand in our way.

I would gather them before me, my voice booming like thunder as I speak of the rewards that come with loyalty. I would tell them of the riches, the spoils of war, the glory and the prestige that await those who stand by my side. I would show them the examples of those who have proven their devotion, who have been rewarded with power, with land, with the fear and respect of our enemies.

But I would also make it clear that disloyalty will not be tolerated. I would show them the examples of those who have faltered, who have doubted or questioned my vision. I would display the gruesome punishments that await those who dare betray me, the brutal fate that awaits those who would seek to undermine my authority.

My followers must understand that I am the one who has brought them power, who has given them a sense of purpose and belonging. They must know that without me, they are nothing, that I am the one who has elevated them from the dirt and the dust. And so, they must be willing to do whatever it takes to protect me, to defend my vision, to carry out my will without question or hesitation.

I would remind them that we are a family, a brotherhood of warriors bound together by blood and steel.
